channel.title: Homes on Welcome to He Zhao's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Welcome to He Zhao's Homepage

item.description: About Me: I’m a Ph.D. student in Faculty of Information Technology, Monash University, since late 2015. I’m fortunately working with Lan Du (supervisor), Wray Buntine (supervisor), Piyush Rai, and Mingyuan Zhou. I received my M.Eng from Nanjing University in 2014 and B.Eng from Nankai University in 2011, respectively. I was a visiting research student in Nanyang Technological University in 2014. I’m interested in statistical machine learning, especially probabilistic (deep) generative models for discrete data, e.
